name: Title Pending: The Adventure of i forgor
name_original: Title Pending: The Adventure of i forgor
description:
This is a mobile application for Android devices, the windows build is not final and won't be included in the final release

The Android build will be updated to a point where I feel it is final

Get ready for the most gamer game you've ever gamed

a game truly like no other game

a game with many endings... and by that i mean 4

meet strang and wacky creature in this hit game

an adventure like no other awaits you
